title: Love Ignited
description: Reclusive therapist to the stars, Ella Lindsey thinks she has it all: peace, quiet, a successful career, and, most importantly, safety. She thinks things are as good as they're going to get until Hollywood bad boy Nathan Bradley is sentenced to ninety days of therapy at the posh treatment facility.When Nate pushes Ella to her limits, she's forced to make choices she never thought she would have to make, both personally and professionally. Meanwhile, danger is lurking just outside the confines of her safe zone.Ella and Nate ignite the pages of this book with sheer passion.Coastal Escape Publishing
author: Avery Michaels
